message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. This is a great deal, considering its true value to me is at least $8000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $9500 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $8800?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $8800. I appreciate your interest in the product! After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $9200. This is still a great deal, considering its true value to me is at least $8000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $9200 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $8500?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $8500. I'm still not willing to go that low, but I'm willing to compromise. I'll meet you at $9000. This is the lowest I can go, considering its true value to me is at least $8000. What do you think?
I understand that you're willing to compromise, but $9000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Would you be willing to consider a price of $8500?
